name: We Need More Steam!
description:
Build and design your power plant for the town. The demand for electricity is constantly increasing, and you are tasked with supplying that power. Turn water into steam and steam into electricity with the use of water pumps, boilers, tanks, and nuclear reactors.

Each town has different demands and a limited amount of space to build your power plant. Planning ahead is necessary as you manage space, money, and supply versus demand of electricity.

Unlock each level by meeting the town's electricity demands and scoring enough to satisfy the endless demand for power.
